A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I absolutely love Star Wars\, but this was garbage. What Rian Johnson did to Luke Skywalker's character was an absolute travesty. Not to mention ridiculous plot-holes\, ludicrous side-stories\, characters who are there just to sell toys to little girls (get ready for "Disney's - The Adventures of Paige and Rose") and humour that is completely forced.

This film feels like the contrivance of a bunch of executives each trying to seize more markets demographics. It's a disjointed\, awful mess of a film. 

When you're working with a setting as wonderfully deep and interesting as the Star Wars universe\, there is no excuse to turn out such absolutely unauthentic\, bland garbage as this film.
